pkgmetadata.longdescription: =====================sphinxcontrib-devhelp=====================sphinxcontrib-devhelp is a sphinx extension which outputs Devhelp_ document.For more details, please visit http://www.sphinx-doc.org/... _Devhelp: https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/DevhelpInstalling==========Install from PyPI:: pip install -U sphinxcontrib-devhelpContributing============See `CONTRIBUTING.rst`__.. __: https://github.com/sphinx-doc/sphinx/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.rst
